recipes: Study the Lore of the Knife
All of the greatest struggles end in death. The Lore of the Knife holds the lessons of those struggles.
I've learnt nothing of practical use. What if I combined this with other lore?

Study the Lore of the Wood
When breath is black at the glass, when mist tautens the skin, when woods walk in winter, we hear these words.

The lore 2 requirement means this is only available when someone has paired two lore fragments with an earlier recipe. This routes to opportunities to increase Insight.
This project has possibilities. When research requirements appear, I must fulfil them to gain Insight. If I gain three Insight, I will succeed; otherwise, I may fail.
Confusion shrouds the path. I must use more of my Reason.
I need to use my Reason to help my research.
The task occupies ever more of my attention. But my efforts are paying off. [Gained Insight.].
The Gates of Intuition are opened!
Sometimes, Insights are found in unexpected places. [Gained Insight.]
this is a passthrough / router for if Insight reaches 3,which routes directly to the conclusion
this is a passthrough / router which the player sees if they don't satisfy a research requirement.
This is currently a pass-through only; including for consistency.
This time, this research has failed. But I've learnt the lessons of experience.
I have read of a power which longs for the sea, which cannot bear to leave divided things apart. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.

I have pieced together my ritual. When I write of it, the candle leans towards me; the pages cling together; even the ink clogs in the pen.[This ritual can only be created once. Performing this combination again will have no effect.]
This is intended to be created via an ongoing slot with fragment study options below, but if a better approach occurs, cool.
I have read of a lone power which walks in the Bounds, the Wood, even the Wake, but never the Mansus. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.

I have pieced together my ritual. It has made me restless. I will rise and look out over the roof-tops, as if in the distance I might glimpse the melancholy swell of far hills.[This ritual can only be created once. Performing this combination again will have no effect.]
This is intended to be created via an ongoing slot with fragment study options below, but if a better approach occurs, cool.
I have read of a power that governs birth and blood. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.

I have pieced together my ritual. I cannot be sure it will succeed. I can be sure that there will be a cost in blood.[This ritual can only be created once. Performing this combination again will have no effect.]
This is intended to be created via an ongoing slot with fragment study options below, but if a better approach occurs, cool.
I have read of one who walks before shadow, and behind light, in a house with no walls. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.

Have I imagined this rite, or re-invented it? I felt as if a hand guided my own. I have read of a power which yearns for beautiful endings. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.

I have read of a power which wishes only to despoil, whose nature is revenge. This rite is its teaching, but a rite may have many uses.
